001package edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.controller;
002
003import android.os.Bundle;
004import androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity;
005import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelProvider;
006import dagger.hilt.android.AndroidEntryPoint;
007import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.adapter.UserScoresAdapter;
008import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.databinding.ActivityScoresBinding;
009import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.viewmodel.ScoreViewModel;
010
011@AndroidEntryPoint
012public class ScoresActivity extends AppCompatActivity {
013
014  private ActivityScoresBinding binding;
015  private ScoreViewModel scoreViewModel;
016
017
018  @Override
019  protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) {
020    super.onCreate(savedInstanceState);
021    binding = ActivityScoresBinding.inflate(getLayoutInflater());
022    setContentView(binding.getRoot());
023
024    scoreViewModel = new ViewModelProvider(this).get(ScoreViewModel.class);
025    scoreViewModel.getAllScores().observe(this, (scores) ->
026        binding.scores.setAdapter(new UserScoresAdapter(this, scores)));
027  }
028
029}
